page.title: 08Shops & Shopping,Great Ayton
page.content: { Great Ayton}has a wide range of shops with everything you need from essential daily items to souvenirs.Car parking is free outside the shops and you can nip in to have a quick chat with the friendly shopkeepers and assistants while buying your provisions.Most of the village shops are on the High Street.They include Supermarkets,Clothes shops,Green Grocers,Hardware,Electrical,Newsagents ,Butchers and several gift shops. Regular{craft fairs}take place in the village hall and local people sell their own work e.g.lace,pottery,rag dolls and patchwork. { Cockerills}is one of the oldest shops in the village.The shops in Great Ayton attract a fair amount of tourists because the village is on the edge of the{National Park}and it also has connections with{Captain Cook.}
